data.title: 10 Unique Small Retail Businesses in Council Bluffs
data.text:
Are you tired of the same old shopping routine? Do you crave a unique retail experience that offers something different from the usual chain stores? Look no further! Council Bluffs is home to a vibrant community of small businesses that offer a diverse range of products and services. From handmade crafts to specialty foods, here are ten unique small retail businesses in Council Bluffs that are worth checking out:

1. Anchor Inn Bait & Tackle

Address: 1201 Veterans Memorial Hwy

Hours: Monday - Thursday 7:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m., Friday - Saturday 7:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Sunday 7:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.

This family-owned business is just minutes away from Lake Manawa State Park. With their knowledgeable staff and variety of gear, it's your one-stop shop for all things fishing in the Council Bluffs area.

Visit their Website!

2. Bambi's Green Acres Natural Market

Address: 805 South Main Street

Hours: Monday - Friday 10:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Saturday 9:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.

This woman-owned and operated business sells healthy merchandise like essential oils, vitamins, health and beauty products, herbs, and bulk health foods. Their dedicated staff is here to help you be the healthiest version of yourself!

Visit their Website!

3. Dorie's Crystals and Things

Address: 509 S Main Street

Hours: Tuesday - Thursday 11:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Friday - Saturday 11:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.

Check out Dorie's Crystals and Things for all things mystic, including crystals, sage, salt lamps, essential oils, and jewelry.

Visit their Website!

4. Dusted Charm

Address: 120 West Broadway

Hours: Tuesday - Friday 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Saturday - Sunday 10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.

This charming boutique has the most adorable women's clothing, home d√©cor, kitchen items, jewelry, and gifts! They are a size-inclusive shop that constantly rotates inventory and hosts sales.

Visit their Website!

5. Kanesville Kollectibles

Address: 530 South 4th Street

Hours: Monday - Saturday 10:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.

Housed in a massive 10,000-square-foot facility, this shop is packed with nostalgic records, books, comics, and movies!

Visit their Website!

6. Sherbondy's Garden Center

Address: 319 16th Avenue

Hours: Monday - Saturday 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Sunday 12:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m.

Sherbondy's Garden Center is a haven for those with a green thumb. They sell trendy house plants, garden gear, perennials, and antiques.

Visit their Website!

7. Sugar Makery Bittersweet Dessert Bar

Address: 19278 Conifer Lane

Hours: Monday - Saturday 11:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m. Sunday 12:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.

The Sugar Makery BitterSweet Dessert Bar is your one-stop shop for all things sweet and salty here in Council Bluffs! They offer various treats, including ice cream, bulk candy, homemade fudge, unique popcorn options, sodas, and more.

Visit their Website!

8. The Olive Branch

Address: 19278 Conifer Lane

Hours: Monday - Friday 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Saturday 10:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Sunday 12:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m.

The Olive Branch has been a Council Bluffs staple for over 20 years. Their adorable shop is filled with home goods, handmade one-of-a-kind pieces, accessories, candles, everything for baby, and a wide selection of high-quality Polish pottery.

Visit their Website!

9. White Ivory Apparel

Address: 928 Valley View Drive, Suite 5

Hours: Monday - Friday 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m., Saturday 10:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.

This trendy boutique is on top of all of the latest fashion trends! Shop new arrivals every week in their welcoming space.

Visit their Website!

10. Xtreme Wheels Bike and Sport

Address: 33 South Main Street

Hours: Tuesday - Friday 12:00 p.m. - 6:00 p.m., Saturday 10:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.

Council Bluffs is home to an impressive and extensive system of bike trails. Shop for the right gear at Xtreme Wheels Bike and Sport in downtown CB! This independent bike shop is dedicated to providing you with the best prices, selection, and customer service. They sell new and used bikes, gear, and bike repair services.

Visit their Website!

Next time you're in Council Bluffs, be sure to support these unique small retail businesses. Not only will you find exceptional products and services, but you'll also be supporting the local economy and fostering a sense of community. Happy shopping!
